review: I have visited with my complete family and place is very awesome beautiful view of Himalaya nice tent and best part is service we have did tracks also played cricket badminton the food quality is fresh and good
name: Karan pratap

review: We went to dhanaulti camps and we had very bad experience.. There were no facilities for guests, no bonfire, washrooms were very dirty and bathing facilities was not available.. I won't suggest this place to visit
name: Sonali

review: Great view of Himalayan, we enjoy 2 nights 3days package, live music guitarist, bonfire, activities jipline, food quality was good,thank you so much Mr. R.K. to make our tour  memorable,tent have picturesque views of white covered Himalayan range
